function.name: Query Response
function.description: Allows the application to control whether the plugin can respond to incoming bootload messages.

arg.name: queryWasBroadcast
arg.description: Boolean indicating whether the query was broadcast or unicast

arg.name: queryData
arg.description: A data structure providing the details about the local device's bootloader.

function.name: Finished
function.description: Notifies the application when the standalone bootload has completed, successfully or otherwise.

arg.name: success
arg.description: Boolean indicating the success or failure of the bootload.
